alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:28PM EDT until July 20 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE AND NORTHERN MERCER COUNTIES... At 627 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rockford, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, New Bremen, Rockford, New Knoxville, Moulton, Mendon, Buckland, Kossuth, Tama, Neptune, State Route 116 at State Route 197 and Bulkhead. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
